analysis.description:
EPCToken.unfreezeBoughtTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x25543db4ff6a57affb219cca074a1e983c024c18.sol#274-290) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- elapsed > buyUnfreezePeriodSeconds (/unique_chucks/5/0x25543db4ff6a57affb219cca074a1e983c024c18.sol#277-290)

EPCToken.unfreezeAwardedTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x25543db4ff6a57affb219cca074a1e983c024c18.sol#290-313) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastUnfrozenAwardedTimestamps[_owner] <= 0 (/unique_chucks/5/0x25543db4ff6a57affb219cca074a1e983c024c18.sol#294-299)
	- elapsed > waitTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x25543db4ff6a57affb219cca074a1e983c024c18.sol#300-313)
